subject: [Radiance-general] Radiance Materials in Eco
body:
I found a tutorial (link below) that describes how to assign the custom Radiance materials.  See page 27 for how to apply the materials to the surfaces - it definitely helps if the surfaces(materials) are separated by zone.

Hope this helps!


http://sustainabilityworkshop.autodesk.com/sites/default/files/core-page-files/bimforadvanceddaylighting_skripac_au2011.pdf



Regards,

Sandy Houck   LEED AP BD+C, LC
Brummitt Energy Associates, Inc.
619-531-1126

Sent: Thursday, July 25, 2013 11:30 AM
To: Radiance general discussion
Hi everybody,
Can anyone tell me how to assign radiance materials to an object (i.e. floor, ceiling, etc.) in Ecotect? I have my RAD material file in the "material" folder of Ecotect, in "user preferences" I have given the direction to this folder in the option of "material export directory" , and I have my geometry modeled in Ecotect.
What should I do?
Best,

--
Dr. Adriana Lira Oliver
Ddes|MDes|BArch
www.adliol.com<http://www.adliol.com/>
http://www.flickr.com/photos/adrianaliraoliver/
